summary.span: 表示描述 Dynamic Data 頁面所使用之資料表的中繼資料 (Metadata)。

summary.span: 取得資料表的資料行集合。

value.span: 包含資料表資料行的集合。

span.span: A collection that contains the columns for the table.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. 在範例中，動態資料頁面範本具有已複製到 \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions 資料夾為 AdventureWorksLT 資料庫的 ProductDescription 資料表提供自訂的顯示。In the example, the Dynamic Data page templates have been copied to the \DynamicData\CustomPages\ProductDescriptions folder to provide a custom display for the ProductDescription table of the AdventureWorksLT database. Insert.aspx 檔案的標記變更成加入`OnDataBound`事件處理常式命名為`DetailsView1_DataBound`。The markup of the Insert.aspx file is changed to add an `OnDataBound` event handler named `DetailsView1_DataBound`. 事件處理常式，方法用來尋找中繼資料表。In the event handler, the method is used to find the meta table. 屬性用來在資料表中顯示的資料行數目。The property is used to display the number of columns in the table. [!code-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicDataExtensions/cs/Insert.aspx#2)]

summary.span: 取得資料行，這個資料行是用來顯示當此資料表中的項目被當成外部索引鍵關聯性 (Relationship) 中的父代 (Parent) 時的值。

span.span: Gets the column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.

value.span: 資料行，是用來顯示當此資料表中的項目被當成外部索引鍵關聯性中的父代時的值。

span.span: The column that is used to display values when entries in this table are used as parents in foreign-key relationships.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回的資料行則依此順序選取路由：The column that is returned is selected in this order: 1. 使用指定的資料行屬性。The column that is specified by using the attribute. 2. 第一個字串不是主索引鍵的資料行。The first string column that is not in the primary key. 3. 第一個字串的主索引鍵的資料行。The first string column that is in the primary key. 4. 第一個非字串資料行是主索引鍵。The first non-string column that is in the primary key. 5. 第一個資料行中。The first column.

summary.span: 初始化呼叫建構函式時可能無法使用的資料。

span.span: Initializes data that may not be available when the constructor is called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫方法中的每個資料行執行個體。This method calls the method for each column in the instance. 無法直接呼叫這個方法。This method cannot be called directly. 若要自訂初始化，您可以衍生自這個類別並覆寫方法。To customize initialization, you can derive from this class and override the method. 如果您覆寫這個方法，呼叫基底控制項的`Initialize`方法。If you override this method, call the base control's `Initialize` method. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何覆寫方法，以自訂的初始化程序。The following example shows how to override the method in order to customize the initialization process. ```csharp protected override void Initialize() { base.Initialize(); MyOverridenInit(); } ``` ```vb Protected Overloads Overrides Sub Initialize() MyBase.Initialize() MyOverridenInit() End Sub ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 快取的資料表中繼資料包含從資料模型的屬性和內建的資料行的相關中繼資料取得的資訊。The cached table metadata consists of the information that is obtained from data-model attributes and from metadata about intrinsic columns. 中繼資料快取就會重建下一次要求任何中繼資料。The metadata cache is rebuilt the next time any metadata is requested.
